alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Boyd; Brown; Custer; Garfield; Holt; Keya Paha; Loup; Rock; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:55AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rock, Loup, southeastern Brown, Garfield, Holt, eastern Custer, eastern Blaine, eastern Keya Paha, Boyd and Wheeler Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 154 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Naper to 7 miles southeast of Weissert. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`neill, Broken Bow, Burwell, Bassett, Spencer, Taylor, O`Neill, Atkinson, Stuart, Sargent, Ansley, Ewing, Merna, Butte, Long Pine, Chambers, Lynch, Mason City, Page and Bartlett. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 82 and 182. Highway 20 between mile markers 250 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 223. Highway 2 between mile markers 267 and 307. Highway 92 between mile markers 273 and 308. Highway 12 between mile markers 68 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for central and north central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Boyd; Brown; Custer; Garfield; Holt; Keya Paha; Loup; Rock; Wheeler
